thread.title: Mexico to Auction 37 Oil Blocks in July

author: Anthony Harrup
title: Mexico to Auction 37 Oil Blocks in July
text:
MEXICO CITYâ€”The Mexican government unveiled plans to offer 37 onshore oil blocks in a July auction, which the Energy Ministry estimates could drum up about $3.3 billion in investment.
The blocks are located in northeastern and southeastern Mexico, covering a combined area of 9,500 square kilometers (3,668 square miles) with prospects of reserves for 260 million barrels of oil equivalent in gas and light crude, the ministry and the oil industry regulator said in a statement Wednesday.
